name: VR Zombies (Gringan)
description:
My First VR Project. (Development in progress) VIVE ONLY

You are a priest who has the power to summon ammunition in his hands !

You have received a collection of devastating weapons.

You are ready to dismember bloodthirsty zombies

Features :

- 19 types of zombies (Lots of animations and sound FX)

- 2 types of others monsters

- 1 Boss ( in progress )

- 11 Weapons with real interactions to reload, slide on, ... (MK18, Glock 22, Clot1911, M1014, M16, AKM, CX8, FAB, MP5, Sako85, UMP, more to come ... ) with Laser sights

- 1 map actually : Explore an infested Zombie Hotel.

- Impact surface system

- Dismembering system

- Environment interactions (open doors, cars, find items, … In Progress)

- Quests (Burning occult books , saving survivors, find keys)

- Loots

- Experience + Leveling to unlock new weapons

Contact me : maximilien.logiudice@gmail.com
